title: Upland Bird Hunting With NRA Outdoors (NRA - National Rifle Association)
text: ( Source : NRA - National Rifle Association ) Four years ago the NRA Outdoors crew joined forces with professional hunter Tim Bradley to put on a group upland bird hunt in Nebraska . It was an immediate hit, drawing men, women, and families who
